Author: palish

Author: bloch
Content:
The problem with the override option is that it is a weak barrier. It takes a split second to click it and after two or three times it becomes a habit to override.

A good solution would force the user to become acutely aware of what he is about to do and give him time to regain enough discipline to stop.

Perhaps it would help if the user were forced to watch a video about procrastination or answer a series of relevant or time consuming questions before proceeding to override noprocrast.

Author: bloch
Content: You can still change the OS time.

Author: axod
Content:
And you are entitled to do exactly as you wish - reprogram it, hack it, reverse engineer it.

It's when you share your findings with the world that the issue arises. You may be exposing trade secrets, copyrighted material etc, or enabling others to circumvent copy protection.

I don't know about DRM, it's optional in Apple products anyway. I have several Apple devices and have never used any DRM. If you don't like it, don't use it.
